chunk:
Moor Spa Cream Mask (2020 formulation)

Brand: Moor Spa

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua, Heilmoor Clay, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Propanediol, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Caprylyl Glycol, Arginine, Natamycin, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil

Directions: After cleansing and toning, apply an e

d toning, apply an even layer over face and neck and relax for ten minutes. Rinse well with warm water and follow with appropriate Moisture Cream for skin type.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
